author: mcconnell
msg: Update the isContextDependent test to include assessment of context via constructor injection.

author: mcconnell
msg: Updae merlinx script based on contribution from Daniel Frey.

author: mcconnell
msg: Bring profile writer up-to-date to support nested logging categories directive externalization.

author: niclas
msg: JavaMail consists of mailapi.jar + others, but no javamail.jar. One problem revolves around the versioning system that Sun employs, which is significantly different from how we do stuff, and the question is how are we supporting that?

author: mcconnell
msg: Push the notion of categories on profiles down to DeploymentProfile and simplify the related API and implementation to consolidate this in one place.  Fix a bug related to updating of the assigning logging channel following modification of the assifgned target categories.
